pullRequest.title: Azure blob layout strategy
pullRequest.bodyText:
Allow configuration of how blobs (and tokens) are laid out in ABS.
By default, uses BlobContainerStrategy.PARTITION, which is compatible with existing backup impl.
If  BlobContainerStrategy.CONTAINER is specified, Azure container maps to accountId_containerId (underscore used as separator to avoid confusion with negative numbers), and replica tokens are all stored in their own dedicated container.

nodes.bodyText: Technically, account IDs can be negative for "unknown" containers or "system" containers like the router account metadata store so I would recommend using an underscore as the separator.

nodes.bodyText: looks like the capitalization here differs from DEFAULT_CONTAINER_STRATEGY

commit.message: Added test for layout strategy and minor refactoring.
Change container name separator to underscore per Casey's comment.

beforeCommit.message: Change container name separator to underscore per Casey's comment.

afterCommit.message: Change container name separator to underscore per Casey's comment.
